tasks.task_description: Check current project structure and identify what exists
Create project folder structure (Models, Services, ViewModels, Views, Utilities, App)
Create error handling and state models (AppError, ContainerState)
Create ContainersListView with table and actions
Add AppConfiguration for kernel path management

description: Build macOS Container Manager app with SwiftUI and Apple's Containerization package
context: Created folder structure: Models, Services, ViewModels, Views, Views/Components, Utilities, App
Created AppError.swift and ContainerState.swift with error handling and state management
Created ContainerInfo.swift and ImageInfo.swift data models
Created ByteFormatter.swift utility for formatting file sizes
Created ContainerService.swift and ImageService.swift with Containerization API integration (note: API methods are placeholders and need verification against actual package)
Created all ViewModels: ContainersViewModel with auto-refresh, ImagesViewModel, and LogsViewModel with streaming
Created reusable UI components: EmptyStateView and ErrorView
Created all main views: ContainersListView with table and actions, LogsView with streaming, and ImagesListView
Created ContentView with sidebar navigation and ContainerManagerApp entry point
Created AppConfiguration.swift for kernel path and settings management. All code files complete!
